general_advisory: Drain out excess water from standing crops by keeping drain ends open. Continue application of fertilizer and plant protection. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases.

advisory: If Blast disease incidence seen then drain out excess water from the paddy field. Remove the weeds and keep the field clean. Foliar spray of Trichodermaviridae should be done @ 4 g/lit. of water.
Rainfall after a dry spell may aggravate infestation of worm in maize. For control the pest spray Beauveria bassiana @ 1200-gram/acre by mixing in 200 water.
After receding of rainfall to manage Internode borer biological use Trichogramma chilonis card @ 1/acre at weekly interval for 6 times by splitting each card into 12 pieces at the given perforations.
